definition: to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle

sentences.english: B. C. C. I. became a magnet for drug money.
sentences.chinese: 国际信贷银行像一块大磁铁，吸引贩毒的钱。

sentences.english: Drug addiction, drug selling and other illegal acts are also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁吸毒贩毒和其他违法行为。

sentences.english: You mean those people involved in selling drugs?
sentences.chinese: 你是指与贩毒案有关的那个人吗？

sentences.english: Dating from the end of the 19th century, Japan began to be engaged in the narco-trafficking in Fujian .
sentences.chinese: 早在十九世纪末，日本就开始在福建从事贩毒活动。

sentences.english: The problem was guns were going to fuel the violence of the cartels in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 问题是，这些枪支强加速墨西哥贩毒集团的暴力行为。

sentences.english: H. R. : Even Hassidic Jews are deeply implicated in drug trafficking.
sentences.chinese: 即使哈西德犹太人都深深地卷入了贩毒行业去。

sentences.english: The police thought that Arab League bold is the chieftain, dealing in narcotics definitely is he instigates, then issues a warrant for arrest him.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为阿豪是头目，贩毒肯定是他主使，便通缉他。

sentences.english: They claimed his campaign had been bankrolled with drug money.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称他的竞选活动是由贩毒资金支持的。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of soldiers are fighting drug traffickers across the country.
sentences.chinese: 成千上万的士兵在全国各地对抗贩毒分子。

sentences.english: But the city has made great strides toward putting its bloody, drug-riddled past behind it.
sentences.chinese: 但这座城市在告别血腥和贩毒等方面却有长足的进步。

sentences.english: They killed Green because he was about to blow the gaff on their drug dealing.
sentences.chinese: 他们杀了格林，因为他要把他们贩毒的事情说出去。

sentences.english: The police have broken a big drug operation in this area lately.
sentences.chinese: 警方最近在这区破获一个偌大贩毒团活动。

sentences.english: Several drug gangs are battling for control of smuggling routes in Guerrero state.
sentences.chinese: 几个贩毒团伙争夺控制格雷罗州走私路线。

sentences.english: Haiti was already a source of illegal migrants and a crossroads for drugs.
sentences.chinese: 海地已经成为了非法移民的源头和贩毒的中转站。

sentences.english: We don't want anything to do with laundering dirty money with drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 我们不要跟贩毒品的人进行的洗钱活动有任何关系。

sentences.english: Some of the drug dealers did time when they were still teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 有些贩毒分子在青少年的时候就蹲过监狱。

definition: to smuggle/to have an illicit affair
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
